price: 75. Sidaasaan u tusinnay Ibraahiim Boqortooyada samooyinka iyo arlada si uu uga mid ahaado kuwa Xaqa yaqiinsan.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُرِيٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ مَلَكُوتَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلِيَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُوقِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nurī ib'rāhīma malakūta al-samāwāti wal-arḍi waliyakūna mina al-mūqinīna
